HCTL Interface - High Level CTL.

detaileddescription.para:
Jaroslav Kysela perex@perex.cz
Abramo Bagnara abramo@alsa-project.org
2000 HCTL interface is designed to access preloaded and sorted primitive controls. Callbacks may be used for event handling. See High level control interface page for more details.
